author: pawandhananjay
content: Couldn't find your peer id in the `lighthouse-geth` logs but from other logs, it seems like lighthouse is rate limiting block/blob requests. We currently allow requests for 1024 blocks in a 10 second window per peer (also 4 times that for blobs).So effectively lodestar has to request 4 epochs worth of blocks every second in order to get rate limited. I can make a patch to allow a higher number of requests or disable the rate limiter for devnet purposes, but on mainnet, I think this could overwhelm the node
